class.name: franka_more_controllers/CartesianImpedanceTrajectoryController
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space, moving in a certain direction in EE frame with a certain speed.

class.name: franka_more_controllers/CartesianImpedanceDirectionController
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space, moving along a line to reach a pose with a certain speed.
